Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Renan
Reviews.Content: Both product and service attended my expectations.Everything went out as I wished and the product is great!I have no complains at all.

ProductInfo.Features:
QUADBAND, QWERTY keyboard, AMOLED capacitive touchscreen
Multi-touch input method, Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate
WIFI, GPS, Symbian^3 OS, Flash Lite 4.0, TV-out (720p video) via HDMI and composite
Dolby Digital Plus via HDMI, Predictive text input
16 GB storage, 256 MB RAM, 1 GB ROM, 8MP CAMERA, Geo-tagging, face detection
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia E7 8mp Quadband Symbian OS Mobile Phone (Silver) - International Version w/ No Warranty
